room_title: Escape room "The Green Room" by Tic Toc Escapes in Raleigh - Durham
review: Our two families had a “groovy” time in the Green Room! It was challenging, but fun. Katherine was fantastic!

room_title: Escape room "The Green Room" by Tic Toc Escapes in Raleigh - Durham
review: Had a great time tonight! Evan was an awesome host! We broke out of the green room with time to spare!

room_title: Escape room "The Green Room" by Tic Toc Escapes in Raleigh - Durham
review: A group of friends and I did the Green Room as part of a girls night. It was everyone's first time doing something like this and we loved it. It was cool to see everyone's strengths/ how people think in different ways. I highly recommend this for anyone who wants to have fun AND use their brains. I will definitely be back.

room_title: Escape room "The Green Room" by Tic Toc Escapes in Raleigh - Durham
review: Me and 3 friends decided to give this a try this past weekend. We have not stoppes talking about it since ! What an awesome time we had, the family who runs this was remarkable and so sweet !! The challenge was so much fun and we thoroughly enjoyed working our brains. We will DEF. Be back, especially as new rooms open !!

room_title: Escape room "The Green Room" by Tic Toc Escapes in Raleigh - Durham
review: Awesome experience! Super helpful and friendly staff. My group of four had a blast figuring out clues and we were even able to get out of the room! I never thought I could get such an adrenaline rush solving puzzles! I definitely recommend this to family and friends looking for something different to do in Raleigh. I most certainly will be back
